parameters.name: EffectiveTime
parameters.description:
The time when you want to update the minor version. Valid values:

*   **Immediately** (default): immediately updates the minor version.
*   **MaintainTime**: updates the minor version during the maintenance window.

>  You can call the [ModifyInstanceMaintainTime](~~473775~~) operation to modify the maintenance window of an instance.

parameters.name: Minorversion
parameters.description: The minor version to which you want to update. Default value: **latest_version**.
